fields.name: MeterCategory
fields.description: The category of the meter, for example, 'Cloud services', 'Networking', etc..

fields.name: MeterName
fields.description: The name of the meter, within the given meter category

fields.name: MeterSubCategory
fields.description: The subcategory of the meter, for example, 'A6 Cloud services', 'ExpressRoute (IXP)', etc..

fields.name: UnitOfMeasure
fields.description: The unit in which the meter consumption is charged, for example, 'Hours', 'GB', etc.
